dcterms:description: A self-collected dataset containing audio and geophone signals of footstep movements captured in an indoor lab environment. The dataset includes 700 positive pairs where the sound and vibration signals of a moving person are present, and 700 negative pairs containing no human presence.
dcterms:title: Self-collected dataset of acoustic and vibration-based sensors

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 700 positive pairs and 700 negative pairs used for training a model to identify human footstep movements. The dataset is designed to facilitate the learning of similarities between audio and geophone signals.
dcterms:title: Dataset of 700 positive pairs and 700 negative pairs
